content: For the first quarter of fiscal year 2022, total net revenue was $39.3 million, compared to total net revenue of $38.3 million in the first quarter of the previous fiscal year. Agribusiness revenue for the first quarter of fiscal year 2022 includes $24.7 million in fresh lemon sales, compared to $25 million of fresh lemon sales during the same period of fiscal year 2021, approximately 1,207,000 cartons of U.S. packed fresh lemons were sold in aggregate during the first quarter of fiscal year 2022 at a $20.48 average price per carton, compared to a approximately 1,320,000 cartons sold at an $18.91 average price per carton during the first quarter of fiscal year 2021. For the first quarter of fiscal year 2022, total net revenue was $39.3 million, compared to total net revenue of $38.3 million in the first quarter of the previous fiscal year.
